product_name: The North Face Powerdome Softshell Jacket - Men's
long_description: Stay warmer and drier during active pursuits without adding extra weight: Wear the breathable Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) soft-shell Powerdome jacket for men from The North Face. Technically advanced fabric resists light rain and snow and is finished with a soft fleece backing for all-day comfort. The North Face Powerdome jacket for men has a zippered Napoleon chest pocket and zippered hand pockets. Molded cuff tabs; hem cinch-cord adjusted inside pocket.
short_description: Stay warmer and drier during active pursuits without adding extra weight: Wear the breathable Polartec(R) Thermal Pro(R) soft-shell Powerdome jacket for men from The North Face.
